item.title: Infinity Nikki: Current Banner, Next Banner, And Past Banners
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Infinity Nikki Current Banners
  • Infinity Nikki Next Banners
  • Infinity Nikki Current Store-Exclusive Outfit
  • Infinity Nikki Permanent Standard Banner
  • Infinity Nikki Banner History

Infinity Nikki is a dress-up game, so naturally, players must collect outfits to dress Nikki according to their preferences. There are many ways to get outfits in Infinity Nikki , like doing quests, collecting items, crafting from sketches, or even buying from the stores. However, the best way to get high-ranked outfit in Infinity Nikki is by pulling on the Resonance Banners.

Resonance Banners consist of two different types; limited and permanent. The Permanent Banner (also known as Standard Banner) always has the same outfit and is always available. Players can use either Resonite Crystals or Diamonds to pull on this banner. Meanwhile, the Limited Banner changes every few weeks and always features different limited-time outfits. Stylists can use Diamond or Revelation Crystals to activate this Resonance banner. Here's an overview of Infinity Nikki current and past banners for Stylists who are curious about the gacha pattern of the game.

Infinity Nikki Current Banners

The current banners in Infinity Nikki is Celestial Wishes , which features the 5-star Wings of Wishes and 4-star Starfall Radiance .

The two 4-star outfits, Ribbon Reverie and Starlit Wishfin are also featured along with the Wings of Wishes set in Phase 2.

Version 1.1 (Phase 1): December 29, 2024 – January 23, 2025

Celestial Wishes

Version 1.1 (Phase 2): January 12, 2025 – January 23, 2025

Ribbon Reverie

Starlit Wishfin

Infinity Nikki Next Banners

Phase 2 of Infinity Nikki 1.1 features two 4-star outfit banners. There's currently no information for version 1.2 banners .

Version 1.1 - Phase 2

Pink Ribbon Waltz & Daughter of the Lake

Infinity Nikki Current Store-Exclusive Outfit

The following Outfits in Infinity Nikki require Stellarite to get, meaning players must spend to buy them from the store. Here are the featured outfits in version 1.1:

Shooting Star Season Exclusive Outfits

Infinity Nikki Permanent Standard Banner

Infinity Nikki permanent Standard Banner features four different 5-star outfits: Blossoming Stars , Fairytale Swan , Whispers of Waves , and Crystal Poems . Unlike the featured outfits, this Resonance is always available and doesn't change.

Infinity Nikki Standard Banner

Infinity Nikki Banner History

The following lists the history of all past Infinity Nikki banners:

Version 1.0 (Phase 2): December 18, 2024 – December 29, 2024

Croaker's Whisper

Bubbling Affections

Version 1.0 (Phase 1): December 5, 2024 – December 18, 2024

Butterfly Dream

Blooming Fantasy

item.title: Rumor: Nintendo Switch 2 Could Be Getting a Lot of Support from Microsoft
item.description:
Summary

  • Microsoft to support Switch 2 with a variety of games, according to recent leaks.
  • Switch 2 expected to have a wider library with more third-party support.
  • Expect newer Microsoft games like Indiana Jones and Senua's Saga on Switch 2.

Leaks suggest Microsoft will be supporting the Switch 2 with a variety of games in the near future. Now that Nintendo has finally revealed the Switch 2, gamers are excited to see even more details about the system and its library. While they may have to wait a while to hear more directly from Nintendo, it seems increasingly likely that more external sources will take the chance to announce their presence on the updated hardware.

Recent leaks have pointed to upcoming releases like Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater coming to the Switch 2. This game is one among many others that appear to be strengthening the third-party presence on the system. The newly announced system has plenty of hype surrounding it, and part of that excitement includes the expectation for the Switch 2 to have a much wider library.

During a stream hosted for the announcement of the Nintendo Switch 2, Brazilian gaming insider Petro Henrique Lutti Lippe, known online as phBrazil, claimed that the console will be getting a strong line of third-party support from Microsoft. Translations of Lippe's statement read "There's more games from Microsoft for Switch 2, that I know of, than any other company." He emphasized that there is a lot of Microsoft content heading for the system, encouraging gamers to look forward to seeing more. There's a considerable amount of new speculation over what games may make the cut.

Strong Microsoft Presence Rumored for Switch 2

The Switch 2 is expected to be a much more powerful console than its predecessor, and with that power should come the ability to host many more third-party games than its predecessor. Microsoft worked to bring plenty of previously exclusive games to the original Nintendo Switch, with hits like Pentiment and Grounded making their way onto the platform, but Switch fans have voiced a desire to see even more third-party support, with some feeling like the ports need to catch up and match more current-gen multi-platform releases.

Microsoft having a bolder presence on the Switch 2 could mean newer games like Indiana Jones and the Golden Circle and Senua's Saga: Hellblade 2 showing up. Other exclusives like Starfield could eventually jump ship. Doom: The Dark Ages could be a strong contender since both Doom (2016) and Doom Eternal made it to the original Switch system. The newest title coming to the newer console makes sense. That being said, Doom Eternal made notable concessions to run well on the Switch, so the hardware improvement is likely long overdue. While there is some idea of what Microsoft games are coming to the Switch 2, rumors seem to suggest many more on the way.

item.title: Reverse: 1999 - Fish And Chips Puzzle Guide (Riddle Answers)
item.description:
As Reverse: 1999, players travel through time and witness the chaos of history, they’ll also come across the hidden beauty beneath every civilization that has come to be. Players take on the role of the Timekeeper and are tasked with saving Arcanists they meet within the Main Story of the game. Each story is filled with various battles, exciting cutscenes and the most random little puzzles that can often be strenuous to solve.

After successfully completing Chapter 2 of the Main Story, Timekeepers can proceed into Chapter 3: Nouvelles Et Textes Pour Rien . Aside from the tumultuous combat that this chapter brings, this particular story brings a challenge that has halted player progression across the world. It will require Reverse: 1999 players to find the whereabouts of an English delicacy loved by many; Fish and Chips.

Fish and Chips in the Kitchen Clues - Reverse: 1999

Players will only be able to access this puzzle after completing Chapter 3: Stage 7 in the Main storyline and by promptly clicking on the “Collect Info” button, they will be able to acquire the necessary clues to figure out where the Fish and Chips are.

The clues are:

  • Monday - Fish and chips in the closet. Bread in the cabinet. Peas purée on the shelf. Vegetables in the basket.
  • Tuesday - Bread on the shelf. Vegetables in the closet. Peas purée in the basket. Fish and chips in the cabinet.
  • Wednesday - Fish and chips on the shelf. Peas purée in the closet. Vegetables in the cabinet.

As per the clues given, it seems that only one item can be in one place at one time. Each of the items also changes each day, which means the food items you are looking for on Thursday can be obtained by eliminating the given answers in the clues.

Where Are The Fish and Chips In Reverse: 1999

If players don’t already know, the Fish and Chips are in the Basket . This is the answer to the first part of the riddle that has stumped players. One more thing to note, is that these answers are case-sensitive . They will only accept ‘Basket’ instead of ‘basket’ .

Where Is The Peas Purée In Reverse: 1999

Similar to the previous question, you need to make sure you answer the riddle correctly as it is also case-sensitive. The answer to the second riddle is “ Cabinet ”. Now, once you have answered both riddles successfully, you’ll be able to move onto Chapter 3: Stage 8 and continue on with the story.

item.title: New York Times Connections Hints and Answers for #586 January 17, 2025
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Words in the NYT Connections Puzzle #586 for January 17, 2025
    • What is the Definition of Contrabass?
    • What is the Definition of Autoharp?
  • Hints for the NYT Connections Puzzle
    • Some General Hints for the Whole Connections Puzzle
    • Yellow NYT Connections Category Hints
    • Yellow Connections Category Answer
    • Yellow Connections Category Answer and All Four Words
    • Green NYT Connections Category Hints
    • Green Connections Category Answer
    • Green Connections Category Answer and All Four Words
    • Blue NYT Connections Category Hints
    • Blue Connections Category Answer
    • Blue Connections Category Answer and All Four Words
    • Purple NYT Connections Category Hints
    • Purple Connections Category Answer
    • Purple Connections Category Answer and All Four Words
  • Answers for Today's NYT Connections #586 for January 17, 2025

Connections is back with another challenge. If you want to win, you will need to figure out all four categories and which words go in them while making fewer than four mistakes. On top of that, the only clues you get are the words themselves.

If you are stuck on this difficult puzzle game, you can find all sorts of help here. Clues to the categories, general puzzle hints, and a whole lot more are available for those looking to solve this puzzle as quickly and as easily as possible.

Words in the NYT Connections Puzzle #586 for January 17, 2025

The Connections puzzle for today contains the words: Hit, Opera, Banger, Rosebud, Pepperoni, Bop, Edge, Link, Tap, Contrabass, Brat, Safari, Autoharp, Chrome, Knock, and Sausage .

What is the Definition of Contrabass?

The contrabass is an instrument. According to Dictionary.com, it is a "member below the bass" or, in the violin family, a "double bass." However, the definition of this word might not be helpful when solving today's puzzle.

What is the Definition of Autoharp?

The autoharp is "a zither having buttons that when depressed damp all strings except those to be sounded, the undamped strings being strummed to produce simple chords," according to Dictionary.com.

Hints for the NYT Connections Puzzle

If you are looking for some helpful hints or spoilers for this puzzle game, you can find them below. You can open up each of these sections with the "Read More" button below each one to see what is hidden inside.

Want to play? Check out the New York Times Games Connections website, available on almost any device with a browser.
